Controller

class MFPipeline.controller.controller.Controller(event_list, config_path=None, config_dict=None, analyst_dicts=None)

Class that controls other analysts and their corresponding tasks. A controller has to be initialized with either config_path or config_dict specified. Otherwise, it will not work.

Parameters:

  • event_list – list, a list with names of events that need to be analyzed by the pipeline

  • light_curves – a list of event names and their light curves

  • config_path – string, optional, a path to a YAML file that has the configuration parameters for the controller

  • config_dict – dictionary, optional, a dictionary containing configuration of the controller

launch_analysts()

This function starts and parallelizes the MFPipeline.analyst.event_analyst.EventAnalyst.

Returns:

Status of work???

parse_config()

Function that parses the YAML file with configuration.

Returns:

configuration in form of a dictionary.
